TEXT: e1: Today I will delete my Facebook account.
e2: Not only because I'm constantly astonished about who wants to be my friend.
e3: I'm also tired of my data boosting the market value of that corporation.
CN RELATION: data, boosting the market value of the corporation (UsedFor)/data, boosting the market value of the corporation (CapableOf)/data, market value of the corporation (PartOf)/data, market value of the corporation (Causes)/corporation, market value (HasA)/data, market value (UsedFor)

TEXT: e4: Facebook warns me emphatically that I may lose contact with my friends.

TEXT: e5: And yet now I'll actually have all the more time for them.
